mapper.select: SELECT poSeq ,mmNickName ,poTitle ,poContent ,poDelNy ,poCategory ,poLng ,poLat ,poCreateDate ,poAddr ,uppo.upPath ,uppo.upUuidName FROM post po LEFT JOIN uploadedPost uppo ON po.poSeq = uppo.upPostSeq AND uppo.upDefaultNy = 1 AND uppo.upDelNy = 0 LEFT JOIN member mm on mm.mmSeq = po.poWriter AND mmDelNy = 0 AND mmAdminNy = 0 WHERE 1=1 AND poDelNy = 0 ORDER BY poSeq DESC
SELECT poSeq FROM post ORDER BY poSeq DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT poSeq ,mm.mmNickName ,poTitle ,poContent ,poDelNy ,poCategory ,poLng ,poLat ,poCreateDate ,poAddr ,mv.mvName ,upmm.upPath ,upmm.upUuidName FROM post po LEFT JOIN member mm on mm.mmSeq = po.poWriter AND mmDelNy = 0 AND mmAdminNy = 0 LEFT JOIN myVillage mv on mv.mvMemberSeq = mm.mmSeq AND mvDelNy = 0 AND mvDefaultNy = 1 LEFT JOIN uploadedMember upmm on upmm.upMemberSeq = po.poWriter AND upmm.upDefaultNy = 1 AND upmm.upDelNy = 0 WHERE 1=1 AND poSeq = #{poSeq}
SELECT upPath ,upUuidName FROM uploadedPost WHERE 1=1 AND upPostSeq = #{poSeq} ORDER BY upSort
